named-query.name: Repository.findByName
named-query.query: select repository from Repository repository where repository.name = :name

named-query.name: Commit.findByRepositoryByHash
named-query.query: select commit from Commit commit join commit.repository repository where repository.idRepository = :idRepository and commit.hash = :hash

named-query.name: Commit.findByRepository
named-query.query: select commit from Commit commit join commit.repository repository where repository.idRepository = :idRepository

named-query.name: Tag.findByName
named-query.query: select tag from Tag tag join tag.repository repository where tag.name = :name and repository.idRepository = :idRepository
